statement.p: In 28.57 of the last 28 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{28}}={0.2857}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{28}. \displaystyle{P}={0.2857}\cdot{28}={7.9996}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 28-7.9996=20.0004 We round that as requested to 20.
